name: Knights can be Creative
description:
mr Knight walks up to a dragon, and slashes his sword at it. but fails and gets blown away by fire!

His sword, now so hot it bent over, is no longer a slashing weapon, what could he possibly do now? what other troubles does he run into?

follow our hero trough an epic adventure with a mindblowing sound track, and a  phenomenal final boss!

can you defeat him?
